main.name: Qusai Awwad
main.description: Certified Supply Chain Analyst (CSCA) and skilled in optimizing operations, streamlining processes, and driving efficiency
main.bio: Industrial Engineering graduate with a Very Good GPA, hands-on experience in production line management, and a Certified Supply Chain Analyst. Skilled in system simulations, Lean principles, and project management with a proven track record in optimizing processes and enhancing team performance. Committed to leveraging resource management and Lean & Continuous Improvement tools to enhance productivity and align with organizational goals.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out to me to discuss topics related to industrial engineering or supply chain management.

education.description: Graduating with a Very Good GPA.

work.title: Intern-Production Engineer
work.description: Managed the production line, ensuring efficient operation, improvement, and adherence to safety and operational standards. Addtion to calculating daily production, ensuring required quantities are met and maintaining smooth operation of production lines.

Certifications.descriptionofcertifications: Through this certification, I gained knowledge in areas like demand forecasting, logistics, and lean management. I learned how to optimize supply chain processes, enhance operational efficiency, and apply continuous improvement principles to drive better business outcomes.
I developed skills in project planning, scheduling, budgeting, and effective communication to manage projects efficiently and deliver results on time.

Achievements.Achive: • Third Place in ISCEA Global Supply Chain Case Competition
Achievements.Achivedes: Successfully developed innovative supply chain strategies by analyzing performance metrics, mitigating risks, and delivering actionable insights for process optimization.
Advanced to the global finals of The Fresh Connection simulation, making strategic supply chain decisions to optimize performance, minimize risks, and align with long-term business objectives

Achievements.Achive: • Winner of the Supply Chain Hackathon (1st)
Achievements.Achivedes: Winner of the Supply Chain Hackathon (1st Place): Achieved first place in a highly competitive supply chain simulation competition, leveraging strategic decision-making in The Fresh Connection game to outperform other teams and deliver exceptional results.

projects.title: Efficient Project Management for EngineerHub Project
projects.description: We structured a whole project from A to Z, using tools like Gantt charts, CPM, and WBS. We also applied risk assessment and budget management to ensure successful and high-quality delivery.

projects.title: Optimizing Project Management with Artificial Intelligence
projects.description: This project leverages AI and machine learning to transform capital project management by using predictive models, automating reporting, and optimizing resource allocation to boost efficiency, cut costs, and improve outcomes.

projects.title: E-commerce Warehouse Optimization with SIMIO Software
projects.description: We developed a simulation model to optimize warehouse operations for an e-commerce site, focusing on staffing, inventory reorder points, and cost analysis.

testimonials.text: Qusai Fawzi is a talented industrial engineer with a strong grasp of complex systems. His work on our machine model project was outstanding, demonstrating both technical expertise and innovative problem-solving. I highly recommend him for any engineering challenge.
